data.description: LWP and LWP::Parallel based POE component
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
POE::Component::Client::UserAgent is an asynchronous, event driven
    LWP and LWP::Parallel based user agent POE component. It lets other
    tasks run while making a request to an Internet server and waiting
    for a response, and it lets several requests run in parallel. The
    name chosen adheres to the convention for naming POE components.
